0.title: Lava-Cave
0.narrative: You enter a cave filled with lava and molten rock. The heat is intense, and you can feel the sweat dripping down your face.

1.title: Cavern
1.narrative: You enter a dark and eerie cavern, with stalactites hanging from the ceiling. The air is damp and musty, and you can hear the sound of dripping water.

2.title: Laboratory
2.narrative: You enter a laboratory, filled with bubbling beakers and strange devices. You can see a mad scientist working on an experiment in the corner.

3.title: Dungeon-Cell
3.narrative: You find yourself in a cold and damp cell. The walls are made of stone and the only light comes from a small window high up on the wall. You hear the faint sound of dripping water.|

4.title: Stable
4.narrative: You enter a stable, filled with horses and the smell of hay. The horses neigh as you enter, and you can see the stable boy tending to them.

5.title: Entrance-Hall
5.narrative: You enter a large hall, the floor is made of marble and the walls are adorned with ancient tapestries. The room is dimly lit, but you can see the silhouette of a figure in the distance.
